import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import AdminSlice from"../Slice/Admin/admin.slice";import UserSlice from"../Slice/User/user.slice";//AUTH SLICE
import AuthSlice from"../Slice/Auth/auth.slice";const store=configureStore({reducer:{AuthSlice:AuthSlice.reducer,AdminSlice:AdminSlice.reducer,UserSlice:UserSlice.reducer}});export default store;
